website_summaries.verdict: Helpful collection of high-quality tools any modeler needs to simplify the work.
pros: With 21 different pieces in this modeler tool kit, you're receiving a good value
Included tools have a better durability than some other choices
All items fit inside a plastic box for easy storage
cons: No advanced tools in this kit, so some experienced modelers may already own quite a few of them

customer_reviews.title: Some you need, some you didn't know you needed
customer_reviews.text: Great kit of tools. Either as a replacement for old ones, or starting your tool assortment for the first timer. So far I've only used the nippers, and they are good quality. Sharp, little to no effort removing sprues and nubs
customer_reviews.author: sparky

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great kit! I've used everything in it already. It enhances my model building hobby by making things so much easier. Don't hesitate. Just buy it. You'll be glad you did. Only thing is, I wish I would have bought the larger kit. I didn't expect such nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Race

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this as a more all purpose miniatures crafting kit, not specifically for model building. While this is not an expensive kit, the tools it contains are functional and get the job done. I have had it for a few months and use some of the tools pretty regularly, especially the craft knife, ruler, and tweezers. All have held up without issue. This is a great multi-purpose tool kit for those working on a smaller scale, and a good value!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: What advertised not what recieved
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 21 piece kit from this seller and the original package arrived. Same contents as pictured. Nine items rather than twenty-one as advertised and imaged. The kit ordered and paided for should also include 3 more tweezers, 5 files, scale, 2 tweekers and one other item. Ordered a replacement and recieved same kit. Fast turn around is the best I can say. False advertising, or just old plain bait and switch going on. Can not recommend buying this item from this seller. Going to return for a refund, wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H

customer_reviews.title: Great Dollhouse tool kil
customer_reviews.text: Very useful tool set. Didn't think I would need ruler because I have about 6 of them in drawers & kids bookbag. But I was wrong. It is only 6 in. so it is great for dollhouses. The nippers are great for plastic flash & snapping wood popsicle sticks in half. The emory boards are great for quick, fine sanding. Like tips of cut popsicle sticks. Xacto knife is a lifesaver. So glad I purchased this set for my miniatures and dollhouses.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so great. The only problem I have is the scalpel's upper piece, that loosens so you can change the blade, tends to come loose on its own, but a small piece of masking tape fixes that. The files are pretty good, even though I broke the tip off of one trying to dig out a hunk of plastic that wouldn't come off a print, I didn't take off a star for that though because that isn't normal use for that tool lol. The pliers that came with it are good quality, and the sanding boards do their job. Overall satisfied, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: darthhonky88

customer_reviews.title: ... building Gundam PLA and these tools all were very useful. The cutter was great and made good cuts
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time in building Gundam PLA and these tools all were very useful. The cutter was great and made good cuts. The different size tweezers were great for the tiny stickers and snapping different parts together. The sanding tools all worked well. I loved it and it was a great value. If you building models i think this something you must get if you just starting.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Used this set for gunpla, and it is a great set to get you started in taking your model kits to the next level. The quality of the overall items is decent, but you could definitely do better if you want to drop some bigger bucks on the individual items. You're paying for the convenience and variety of this set, which it definitely delivers on.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I have been painting one piece minis for a while now, but just started getting in to assembling terrain. I bought this set to get the snippers and files I needed to cut and remove mold lines. The only reason I am knocking off a star is that I think the set could use a small wire brush for cleaning the files. The included cloth is too soft and catches and you really need a brush to clean them properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Very Excellent Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband "borrowed" some tools from my craft kit so I had to get him his own! These more than made him happy! The kit came with everything he needed for model building and at a very reasonable price. The tools are extremely well made and sturdy. Whom ever put this set together knew what they were doing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase other than the fact it has items that look like they've been used already
customer_reviews.text: The kit is an awesome value compared to other similarly assembled kits on amazon.The only issue I had was that some of the polishing sticks either.appeared to be slightly damaged or used.My sister was looking at the kit when it arrived and showed that two of tye polishing sticks appeared to have already been used but other than that its a good buy for either an amatuer builder or a professional modelers or someone who needs these items for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: shaun sites

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit has a lot of basic decent tools. I upped the ante with one of my sons that seems to enjoy modeling. The model is of decent quality and deserves having correct tools. I believe this kit will fill the need. BTW he loved it. Bada bing.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesman

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised by the quality of the kit and contents
customer_reviews.text: My son needed these for a model project, and I figured they would be a cheap solution. Upon receipt, I was really surprised by the quality and precision of the tools. They aren't professional-grade, but they're well worth the money for most projects.
customer_reviews.author: IBuyTooMuchOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Buffing stick looks like it had been used.
customer_reviews.text: I have the basic version of this set since I am a beginner in scale model building. Wanted to upgrade my tools by purchasing this set since it had a little more items that I could use (and now know how to use them a little). Was looking forward to this arriving but the buffing stick looked like it has been used with a defect on it. For the price, I was expecting it to be somewhat in an OK condition, not a used one and being wrapped up again nicely to be sent to another customer. Definitely returning it. I include a pic of the buff stick
customer_reviews.author: Amie Aminuldin

customer_reviews.title: Decent value but quality control is very spotty
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased the smaller version of this kit and was happy with everything included. This larger version should include a larger box for your items. The polish stick was poorly glued together and had adhesive stuck on the outsidd.
customer_reviews.author: Xuse

customer_reviews.title: A NICE STARTER KIT
customer_reviews.text: Thisxwas billed as an advanced modelers kit. Not really anywhere advanced. Was looking for higher end quality which I couldn't seem to find on your site and the inexpensive price should have been a red flag for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Kehler

customer_reviews.title: Solid collection of tools for cheap
customer_reviews.text: I started doing smaller tank models and bought this for that purpose. Like many items on Amazon, there is great value here for cheap. The pliers are great, the "polishing" blocks and files are good, as are the screwdrivers. The small exacto knife is almost useless. Not very sharp and very shaky. I would recommend buying a seperate knife somewhere else in addition to this toolset. If you continue your modeling hobby you will no doubt out-grow this toolset but it is a solid value for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's happy so it must be good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use for building his models. He said he is very happy with everything it came with and has been using it since it arrived. I can't attest to the quality myself but he thinks it great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The snips, nail files, tweezers. and screwdrivers are ok. No great, but they work well enough. Everything else is pretty much junk. I would just buy the tools separately and get good tools for your project needs.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Nice, useful kit
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all the tools in the kit, but I think it has everything you would need for your crafts and various hobbies. I think it would have been nice if a small scissor was also part of the kit. Makes it easier to cut the ity-bity paper projects than you standard size scissors.
customer_reviews.author: minimint83

customer_reviews.title: Using for 3D Printing
customer_reviews.text: Got this kid for my kid who is doing 3D prints and needs tools to smooth the product. He is very happy with this kit. Now I get to have all my craft & household tools returned, and he has his own tool set!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for myself as I do a lot of crafts from miniature dollhouse to beading.. these tools will come in very handy.. Nice assortment.. very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Mabby

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who builds all kinds of models—wood, metal, everything and anything! He loves it! He has used every item in the set on the first day! He loves the thin file! He uses it a lot! I highly recommend this set for anyone who is crafty.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisF

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Everything inside was perfect for making a miniature house. I just wished the plastic box was a tad bit bigger. Its always hard to put all the pieces away and close the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Judith G.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because I bought a DIY Miniature house. Are used every single one of these tools and extremely happy with my Purchase. So I bought another one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: All the tools you need on the go
customer_reviews.text: I got it to take with me when I go to club meetings and want to make a plastic model at the meeting. It's great to have everything I need in one case. They items aren't the best quality but a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: Quite upset the the plastic container for the tool is broken. To the point there is no point to keep the tools inside because they fall out also 2 tweezers are missing! NOT HAPPY AT ALL! This was part of my husbands birthday gift and it was late shipped and the day of delivery was changed multiple time!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy ezell

customer_reviews.title: Tools seem fairly well made.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used the X-acto knife, curved tweezers and the sprue clippers. All work well. In time I will use other tools. All seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: NRevellTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tidy Kit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He is doing snap together models for now, but I think this kit will also ease his transition to more complex models later.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Starting Workbench
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item if you are just starting to build tools on your workbench. This has all of your basic items to get started for your first few projects. I did not have a lot of this and was very covenant to find it all in a single box for model making.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Norman

customer_reviews.title: Bunch of cheap tools to get foot in the door
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about starting out and not ready to commit to expensive tools - buy this set, it will give you a good idea if you would like to proceed or not
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied .
customer_reviews.text: I have worked on all-inclusive materials and used the tools. Any tool I needed was available . Great bigger set. Can't say the same about me, but will continue having fun. Recommend this tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cefalu

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for the price, wish was organized better
customer_reviews.text: The tools seem decent enough for the price. I wish the container organized them better. They are just smashed together and you have to take everything out to get one tool.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Great starting point
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I mainly bought it for the clippers and razor, but everything in here was fantastic for the price. Not the best quality and the tweezers bend after a little use, but for the price you cant beat it. I would highly recommend this as a starting point for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband because he likes to assemble model cars, he's really happy with it. Hasn't complained yet, and that's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: carol v.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This kit includes all the tools you need to make high quality models. Worth much more than the price they are charging
customer_reviews.author: roy

customer_reviews.title: His happiness
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a model car enthusiast and when this kit arrived he was excited to see the buffers and and others tools in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good intermediate model builders kit. everything you need to assemble plastic models with a good clean fit. cutter re sharp and the files work well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great set to start out with in modeling
customer_reviews.text: I wish they explain better what each tool was an how to use correctly. Yes you can figure it out but a little education would of help. Quality is good and everything worked well
customer_reviews.author: russell howell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools for a beginner. It had more than what I needed and added value to putting my project together.
customer_reviews.author: George Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great set that does job pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit for 3D printing or anything else in same realm. Tons of tools and they seem decent quality for a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tran

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Get this for the tweezers, cutter, and razor alone! The rest is just extra random, well the files are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: jimbob h.

customer_reviews.title: Neat, small case crammed with small modeling tools.
customer_reviews.text: I like all the nifty modeling tools packed solidly in one plastic case. Easy to find and dig out just what you need.
customer_reviews.author: tmwalsh

customer_reviews.title: Use this more than I thought I would!
customer_reviews.text: Everything but the kitchen sink in this little box! The snippers do have a very strong smell from the plastic grips, so don't sniff them up close lol!
customer_reviews.author: Aangel3234

customer_reviews.title: this is a good model building kit
customer_reviews.text: there are a lot of kits to choose from....this is a good kit for beginner and intermediate level builders.
customer_reviews.author: RN1

customer_reviews.title: Modeling Kit
customer_reviews.text: Have used almost everything in the kit since I got it. Great collection of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W McGill

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: The pliers and the sanding pads are really handy. Has a lot of handy tools for model cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful to build models
customer_reviews.text: My son really needed the tools in this kit to build his model.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Nut

customer_reviews.title: Good value!  Nice tools.
customer_reviews.text: Good tools for miniature house/room making. The files are especially handy. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri E. Haire

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need minus model, glue, paint and skills.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. I started modeling again after a decade or so. I needed some tools and this had most of what I needed at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: r!der

customer_reviews.title: Variety of tools
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of tools included, great for crafting!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long at all
customer_reviews.text: Not great most of the products feel apart half way through my very first build with this set I would look for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Derek southard

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.text: My hobby is putting together miniature houses. This kit has quality tools and everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: M. Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 21 Piece Set, Got 9 Piece Set.
customer_reviews.text: Okay tools, but hopefully you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Thomes

customer_reviews.title: used it to build
customer_reviews.text: used it to build a gundam and it was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Lahm Sayasack

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED WITH THIS PURCHASE ! !
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised and on time. Quality product ! !
customer_reviews.author: Bladepolisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Come in a little case. All the perfect tools for beginner
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Mikels

customer_reviews.title: All in one great tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Everything you need in a small reclosable case
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dad
customer_reviews.text: My father is an older model car enthusiast with severely shaky hands. This simple little tool kit has made his favorite hobby ten times easier.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Powell

customer_reviews.title: Better then what I thought!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality then I thought it would be. Very impressed with everything!!! I have already ordered more stuff from this company. Thank you for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lot of tools for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: A very good set for someone starting out in modeling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and has every thing i need for my hobby work.
customer_reviews.author: Sj Scors1

customer_reviews.title: good kit for a start
customer_reviews.text: this kit will go a long way for me starting off doing models. good quality tools. cant wait to open my first box of an A10 Warthog Airplane. Thanks for the fast shipping.will look your way if i need something else for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Farm girl

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper made, for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Decent kit for beginners.Case and and most of the tools are made cheaply. The tweezers are the nicest part of the kit. I bought this kit for a friend so we could build gunpla together and with the additional purchase of a real xacto knive he seems to b happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: So many wonderful tools in one awesome box! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Jana G. Buckler

customer_reviews.title: Good set for first timers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my first Gunpla. For what I needed these worked well. I've since upgraded the side cutters for a better pair because the ones in this set dulled out after a couple builds. But if your buying this for your first model it should do you right.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mahlon Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for someone who recently got into building models. The kit has everything you could need and then some. The blades for the razor knife are dull by comparison to xacto or similar hobby knife blades, but that's a few bucks at the local Wal Mart to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a great selection of tools too use and I feel like the price is just right for the amount of things you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great toolkit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get back into aircraft model building and this toolkit came in very handy. Shipped fast too!
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: This box set of tools and accessories is perfect for the beginner or even the advanced model builder recommend for anybody that wants to get started everything you need to get started this here..
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: The detail was great!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are serious about model building you need this kit...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Y. Sotiriou

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The nips work great for model trees cut extremely close would pay that much just for the nips then you get the rest off the stuff great quality
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great multi tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Comes with so many different pieces. I ended up with two of a few things when I got this kit. Great way to.get started with modeling, or anything you could think to use those tools for!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Building my Fisrt Gundam after procrastinating for 10 years
customer_reviews.text: Every Gundam builder I talked to recommendeded this exact product. Excellent product, if your going to build a Gundam, get this one!!
customer_reviews.author: DARKQUNARI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome- worth every cent. All you need right here in one pack- can’t say enough!
customer_reviews.author: christianna c.

customer_reviews.title: High caulity great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Presision at its best high caulity at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Aimee K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality hobby snips
customer_reviews.text: The hobby snips broke on my first attempted cut. Didn’t even cut through the thin plastic before breaking. The kit is cheaper than assembling all of the tools separately if you need them, but if you’re interested in this product mainly for the hobby snips, I’d look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: S. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for modelers has a good range of tools to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Howard

customer_reviews.title: Rustark 21Pcs Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set Hobby Building Tools Kit For Gundam Car Model Building
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together for the beginner in modeling gave it to my grandson. well worth it's value.
customer_reviews.author: 101st AIRBORNE  (NAM 1966-68)

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of tools, seems pretty durable, price tad high but worth it for selection
customer_reviews.author: R. Toussaint

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but has off-putting scent
customer_reviews.text: The pliers are high quality as are the tweezers but had to knock off 1 star because even weeks later it has a distinctive chemical smell. Still a worthy purchase for any beginner
customer_reviews.author: nick baldassare

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: My dad likes the set, it has most of what he needs to do his hobby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for model building and crafts etc.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic model kit to start you out with model building. Has everything and more than you'll need. Highly recommended for anyone building models and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: carter

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had received an unscratched box
customer_reviews.text: Was going to use this for my gundam builds. And as other collectors and gundam builders, I am sure you would like your things to be neat/unscratched. But the case came severely scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Kisuna

customer_reviews.title: bundle deal
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 3d printer and its perfect little bundle for everything you may need
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, very well made!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said these tools made a huge difference with his model building! Very helpful and all the tools you need for making any project easier. Tools are well made!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my guy who is getting into making models. He loves the way everything fits in one box and can easily be stored
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Brought my modeling to the next level
customer_reviews.text: The case is too small for what comes in it. I would recommend getting another case for storage. Other than that, the nippers work amazing and the exacto knife is extremely sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: Going to be using this for Gunpla building mostly. Only thing I would change out are the files for plastic,but they should be usable for metal mini's.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Great for a starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for a starter. The description could be a little more detailed considering this is for beginners. Items appear and feel quality. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: William foreman

customer_reviews.title: Must have for scale modelers
customer_reviews.text: Best kit for scale modelers, has everything needed and more.
customer_reviews.author: DiceZero

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit .
customer_reviews.text: The metal files are worthless, other than that it's a nice little kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brent M Fuller

customer_reviews.title: great tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: highly recommended that all scale model builders have one of these. good kit

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought on July 4th paid for two day shipping and just received it today on july 9th. Shipping was poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Model Making
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tools as a gift for my husband. He is pleased with everything contained in the kit, and I was pleased with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Just me in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts. Only needed a few of them but those all worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lala Orange

customer_reviews.title: Beginners full kit
customer_reviews.text: The whole set is a very decent starter kit, but I can see already that it's definitely more useful to see what pieces you use and eventually upgrade. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: 3D Printer's Friend
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean up my PLA 3D prints. Very useful! Everything is good quality. Love the mini screwdrivers and the metal files.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set for the money and all the tools seem to be good quality. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: had broken case
customer_reviews.text: ent the seller a message and they immediately replaced the case everything is nice and a well roun kit for doing any model project for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: howard Deforest

product_meta.title: Rustark 21Pcs Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set Hobby Building Tools Kit for Gundam Car Model Building
product_meta.description:
Findfly 21Pcs Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set Hobby Building Tools kit for Professional Model Assemble Building.

Package Include: 
1Pcs x Graver
1Pcs x 5Pcs spare blade
1Pcs x Separator
1Pcs x Steel rule
1Pcs x Sde Pliers
1Pcs x Polishing Block
1Pcs x Polishing cloth
2Pcs x Screwdriver
2Pcs x Double-sided polished bar 
5Pcs x Tweezers
5Pcs x Files

Note:
Because the Modeler Basic Tools are very shape, so please use with care, and take they away from children.
feature_bullets: ✔ APPLICATION: The modeler basic tools set is suitable for a beginner and advanced modeler as well. You can use it to manufacture toys, cars, robots, cartoon, and other crafts.

✔ FULL RANGE & COST EFFICIENT: Package include : 1 x side pliers, 2 x screwdriver, 5 x files, 1 x separator, 1 x steel rule, 1 x polishing block, 2 x double-sided polished bar, 5 x tweezers, 1 x graver and 1 x 5 spare blades, 1 x polishing cloth. And the items are protected by a plastic box in case of damage. Very easy to use. Meet all beginner’s basic requirements.

✔ DURABLE: Trimmer pen is tightly clamped and has high hardness. With safety protection cap to protect blade. The cutting pliers is made of carbon steels, good durability. The tweezers are made of high strength stainless steel, anti-static, anti-acid, anti-corrosion and anti-magnetic. Other items also have good quality.
